Posts.Content: Oct 16, 2008 10:28AM - edited Oct 16, 2008 10:29AM by eag011 Thank you so much..I knew I could count on this board to find the support we needed..she had hospice come in today and she's going to stay at home as long as she can...again thank all of you.  My prayer is that somehow, someway they find a cure for this ...beast..thats not what Ireally want to call it..but since I'm asking for prayers...
Posts.Title: Keep My Neighbor in Your Thoughts and Prayers eag011 LuAnnH

Posts.Content: eag011 wrote: Hi Ladies, I'm a member of the board, not as active as I was in the beginning, but  you ladies are the most supportive I've known...so please keep my neighbor Brenda in your thoughts and prayers.  She's stage IV and yesterday her doctor advised that they would be discontinuing treatment.  When she told me this morning it broke my heart.  The only thing I can do right now is be there for her when she needs me...its real...I know it is, but so hard to accept.  I was stage II, but it still scares me..thank you for understanding.
